io.netty.handler.codec.dns

Class AbstractDnsRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.handler.codec.dns.AbstractDnsRecord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DnsRecord
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultDnsQuestion, DefaultDnsRawRecord

    public abstract class AbstractDnsRecord
extends Object
implements DnsRecord
    A skeletal implementation of DnsRecord.

      • AbstractDnsRecord

        protected AbstractDnsRecord(String name,
                 DnsRecordType type,
                 long timeToLive)
        Creates a new IN-class record.
        Parameters:
        name - the domain name
        type - the type of the record
        timeToLive - the TTL value of the record

      • AbstractDnsRecord

        protected AbstractDnsRecord(String name,
                 DnsRecordType type,
                 int dnsClass,
                 long timeToLive)
        Creates a new record.
        Parameters:
        name - the domain name
        type - the type of the record
        dnsClass - the class of the record, usually one of the following:
        • DnsRecord.CLASS_IN
        • DnsRecord.CLASS_CSNET
        • DnsRecord.CLASS_CHAOS
        • DnsRecord.CLASS_HESIOD
        • DnsRecord.CLASS_NONE
        • DnsRecord.CLASS_ANY
        timeToLive - the TTL value of the record
